title: ‘I Had to Fight for Everything:’ Son of TV Repairman to Olympic Champion, the Origin Story of Michael Mørkov
content:
First bike, first win, first contract: Mørkøv's unlikely rise to become the peloton's most dangerous leadout man and Madison gold medalist.

Read the full article at ‘I Had to Fight for Everything:’ Son of TV Repairman to Olympic Champion, the Origin Story of Michael Mørkov on Velo.
author: ahood
